io.micronaut.pulsar.processor

Class SchemaResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.pulsar.processor.SchemaResolver

  • @Singleton
public class SchemaResolver
extends Object
    Message type resolver for Pulsar schema. Uses customised Schema for JSON; otherwise falls back to the ones from Apache Pulsar Java library.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Haris Secic

    • Method Detail

      • decideSchema

        public org.apache.pulsar.client.api.Schema<?> decideSchema(io.micronaut.core.type.Argument<?> body,
                                                           @Nullable
                                                           io.micronaut.core.type.Argument<?> key,
                                                           io.micronaut.core.annotation.AnnotationValue<?> topicAnnotation)
        Resolve which schema to use for ser/der.
        Parameters:
        topicAnnotation - annotation corresponding to one of the Pulsar annotations: consumer, reader, producer.
        body - argument that represents message body
        key - if message is of type key-value a key should be passed; otherwise use null
        Returns:
        new Schema
